projectDetails.intro: The high-class Eurowindow River Park apartment has officially been launched. Exceptional policies for customers:
benefits: Free tickets for a 3-day 2-night vacation at a famous tourist destination worth 10 million VND.
Techcombank supports 70% of the apartment value over 25 years, with 0% interest for the first 2 years.
15% discount when paying 95% of the apartment value in advance.
Project name: Eurowindow River Park. Developer: Eurowindow Holdings Group.

expandedDetails.location: With a prime location, Eurowindow River Park is adjacent to the Red River, providing a green, clean, and fully equipped living environment.
expandedDetails.address: Tran Huu Duyet Street, Nam Tu Liem District, Hanoi.
expandedDetails.amenities: Amenities: Shopping center, infinity pool, gym, children's play area, BBQ area...
